root.name: Pet Racer
root.description: OverviewPet Racer is a racing game developed by Techland and published by Big City Games for the PC platform.Menu of Singleplayer:RaceClassic race with optional features.AdventureCampaign where you can unlock race. In the game are 5 Campaign. In one campaing are 4-6 races.Bull´s forrestGiraffe´s dry landsBear´s winterdenGorilas´s jungleRobo´s moonLion´s kingdomExtraRaces witch special mods.TurboFair playPower raceMegatntLow gravity
